OUR PROVEN TREATMENTS WILL HAVE YOU FEELING BETTER IN NO TIME.

Brazilian Lymphatic drainage involves bringing the fluid stuck in between cells and in the tissue to the lymph nodes, in order to be pumped out of the body. It requires a deeper touch, so it helps with cellulite appearance and increases circulation in general, working to detox, de-bloat, and contour the body. It requires a deeper touch, so it helps with cellulite appearance and increases circulation in general, creating that “sculpting” effect. Eliminate puffiness, clear sinuses, and detoxes face and neck.

Most of the clients that seek Brazilian Lymphatic Drainage Massages come to Healing Kneads from aesthetic surgeries such as liposuction, smart lipo, tummy tucks and Brazilian butt lifts. It is a high-demand procedure.

It requires a deeper touch, so it helps with cellulite appearance and increases circulation in general, working to detox, de-bloat, and contour the body.

FULL BODY & FACE
Brazilian Lymphatic Drainage for body and face. Lymphatic drainage massage involves bringing the fluid stuck in between cells and in the tissue to the lymph nodes, in order to be pumped out of the body. It requires a deeper touch, so it helps with cellulite appearance and increases circulation in general, creating that “sculpting” effect. 90 minutes session
BOOK NOW
CAVITATION
Ultrasonic Cavitation is a body contouring treatment that is used to remove fat deposits under the skin. It utilizes ultrasound waves that cause fat cells to rupture. It is meant to target small areas to aid in contouring the body. It is not a treatment for people trying to lose a lot of weight. It also delivers Radio Frequency which is a low radiation to heat the skin called the dermis. This heat stimulates the production of collagen to help improve signs of wrinkles and sagging skin.
BOOK NOW

our values

RESPECT
Every person that enters our studio will be treated with respect, kindness, and care. We greet each and every person with eye contact and with confidence and compassion.
EDUCATION
Our role is to not only achieve positive results, but also empower each of our clients with knowledge about their bodies and what they can do to enhance their own well-being.
RESULTS
We are motivated to achieve extraordinary, measurable results for our clients, ourselves, and each other. We readily acknowledge those results no matter how incremental.
CLIENT FOCUSED
Our goal is to create long-term therapeutic relationships with clients as a part of their choice to live healthier lives.
LISTENING
Health issues and concerns are common, but everyone has unique symptoms that cause them distress or concern.
